org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components

Class Rider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.BaseComponent
      • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.Rider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeSetOwner

    public class Rider
extends BaseComponent
    Rider contains all the geometry for a Bicycle specific rider. The rider is a component of the bicycle, but references the project level rider measurements and rider pose.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.components.BaseComponent

    • Method Detail

      • updateRider

        public void updateRider(java.awt.geom.Point2D basePoint,
                        java.awt.geom.Point2D rightFoot,
                        java.awt.geom.Point2D leftFoot,
                        java.awt.geom.Point2D handPoint)
        Update the rider. This updates the rider from the calculated positions.
        Parameters:
        basePoint - The base point is the seated position or out of saddle position.
        rightFoot - The right foot location.
        leftFoot - The left foot location.
        handPoint - The hand location.
